name: 阿登·布里亚尔·沃伊尔斯
name_full: 阿登·布里亚尔·沃伊尔斯 Arden Briar Voyles
introduction: Arden Briar Voyles is an 8 year old, versatile child actress hailing from San Diego, California. With a unique heritage that blends Southeast Asian (Thai, Laotian, and Cambodian) and German American roots, Arden has captivated audiences and directors alike with her natural talent and endearing personality.Arden made her professional debut at the tender age of 5, becoming the youngest cast member in The Book of Boba Fett. She played a Rodian child encountered by Djarin in the episode "Chapter 5: Return of the Mandalorian." Her ability to perform under challenging conditions, including wearing a Rodian mask for six hours without a single complaint, showcased her dedication and maturity beyond her years. This impressive display of professionalism led to her being directly booked for The Mandalorian Season 3, Episode 5, where she appeared in a scene directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Lee Isaac Chung.Despite her young age, Arden has earned a reputation on set for her strong work ethic, sweet and shy demeanor, and undeniable talent. These qualities have not gone unnoticed, with directors and industry professionals praising her consistently.When she's not acting, Arden enjoys a range of creative activities. She loves to immerse herself in books, express her artistic side through painting and drawing, practice ballet, and spend quality time making arts and crafts with her family and friends. Arden shares a close bond with her older sister, Madeleine Yuna Voyles, who is also an accomplished child actress.
